name: Mikasa Ackerman LoRA
description:
Mikasa Ackerman LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

I made this LoRA to be increase the character consistency of my Attack on Titan Anime Style LoRA (the first example is using that), but of course it can be used with any style, even photo realistic, if the model is trained on booru tags. I offset it so that it can be used at weight 1 on my usual anime models and on NeverEnding Dream (and at much lower weight if used with the AOT style lora, as that one already knows Mikasa). Triggers with mikasa ackerman and requires descriptive tags, so that you can customize her any way you want it. Also keep in mind to be careful, as Civitai renames lora files upon download, so yours won't match my prompts.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
